mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auth_password(user_id, password_value, password_salt, password_changed_time, create_time) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{passwordValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwordSalt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwordChangedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
